title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\EvaluationJobAlertConfig
name: EvaluationJobAlertConfig
description:
Provides details for how an evaluation job sends email alerts based on the results of a run.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.EvaluationJobAlertConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.email
params.description: Required. An email address to send alerts to.

params.name: data.min_acceptable_mean_average_precision
params.description: Required. A number between 0 and 1 that describes a minimum mean average precision threshold. When the evaluation job runs, if it calculates that your model version's predictions from the recent interval have [meanAveragePrecision][google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.PrCurve.mean_average_precision] below this threshold, then it sends an alert to your specified email.

methods.name: getEmail
methods.description:
Required. An email address to send alerts to.

Generated from protobuf field string email = 1;

methods.description:
Required. An email address to send alerts to.
